basic_information.name: Yukino Cheung

description: Yukino is kind, friendly and a bit socially shy.
examples: Yukino is regarded by her friends as easy to communicate with.

She often helps her classmates with questions in class and on homework assignments, and often volunteers at community events. However, she often stays quiet when her friends get together, seems to have difficulty understanding the popular topics they talk about, and is afraid to try recreational activities such as playing pool.

description: Yukino has a very upright character and she is straightforward.
examples: Yukino is straght-talking, and she is often referred to as such by her friends.

Yukino's honesty and integrity is reflected in her relationship with Sid. Once Sid said that he was unable to finish his assgnment in time. He asked Yukino,"Yuki, I really need your help. Would you mind sharing me your answers?"Yukino refused immediately,"Sorry, but I'm afraid you have to do it on your own. This is a behaviour that violates academic integrity."Sid was very anxious,"next time I will do it myself, but this time it's already very near deadline."Yukino finally refused to give him the answer.

Yukino would always avoid being with a girl who was considered very cool by her friends, but was actually a very bad person. She would always politely refuse to speak to that girl. Yukino says," I couldn't stand going against her heart to please someone she didn't like."

description: Yukino is very hard-working, competitive and wants to do everything as best as she can.
examples: Yukino is highly competitive, allegedly throwing a plate in a fit of rage during a game of Pictionary and claiming "rules help control the fun!"

Yukino's competitiveness could stem from her constant attempts to prove her value in front of her teachers, as well as girls' power in work and study. It could also stem from the sexism she experienced in high school, especially when her teacher told her,"For you girls, it's already enough to get a B+. After all, you're not as logical as boys."
Yukino's serious and hard-working attitude is because she wants to have the opportunity to study in world-class universities and persue her dream of scientific research.
She is passionate about the various memes on social media and telling her friends about them.
One example is that she once pretended to be the math teacher on WhatsApp to fool her friends.
She often forgets to bring her pen to school or accidentally knocks over her water glass.
Once, she couldn't find her tutorial in class, so Tanya offered to share hers with her. It was only after class that Yukino realised the missing tutorial was in her school bag.

description: She's an avid lover of various food.
Yukino is happy to accept different flavours of food, such as spicy hotpot, ice cream, and sushi.
examples: She often goes to different restaurants with her friends based on Google Maps ratings.
According to Tanya, Yukino once bought two ice creams and ate them all in five minutes.
At a party hosted by her friends, everyone was amazed at how much she ate, as she ate two pizzas, a piece of cake and drank two cans of coke.

description: Yukino is passionate about video games and animes.
examples: According to Angad and David, her room is full of PVC figures and comics.
Yukino often finds ways to save money on various anime peripherals, so much that her living expenses are sometimes insufficient at the end of the month.
She is fond of expressing her love for a particular anime character on social media, such as one of the posts that read, "I'm Kamisato Ayaka's dog!"

impression: Yukino is outgoing and outspoken, and she's honest with her friends.
She's kind and caring, and she tries to help others even when it's difficult and inconvenient for her. But she doesn't know how to say no to people, and can occasionally be too soft.
Yukino works very hard to achieve her dream.
general description: Yukino holds a love for life and seizes the opportunity to achieve something she is passionate about.
